register.description: Contains a component code and revision, which are used to identify the hardware of the component.

bitfield.description: Read returns 0

register.description: Contains a component code and revision, which are used to identify the hardware of the component.

bitfield.description: Interconnect code.
Component revision code.

register.description: Define the base address of each segments

bitfield.description: Read returns 0.
The base address of the segment (with 0s from bit 0 to bit SIZE-1).

register.description: Define the size of each segments

bitfield.description: Read returns 0.
Segment size is a power of 2, where 2^SIZE is the byte size of a segment (all segment registers use the same size).

register.description: Define connID bit vectors for a protection group.

bitfield.description: Read returns 0
A bit of 1 in position n means that connID n is allowed in this protection group. Illegal connIDs have their bits set to 0s.

register.description: Define the size, protection group^and segment ID of the region

bitfield.description: Read returns 0
Identifies the segment to which the region is part of.
Read returns 0.
The protection group containing this region.
The target OCP data byte width is 2^(BYTE_DATA_WIDTH_EXP) bytes. The value of this field is derived from the target OCP data_wdth parameter.
Read returns 0.
Define the size of the region in bytes. 2^SIZE equals the region.
0x0: Disable the region, no access allows0x1: Enable the region, with access as define in registers

Define the size of the region in bytes. 2^SIZE equals the region.
0x0: Disable the region, no access allows0x1: Enable the region, with access as define in registers
